channel.title: Test on My HugoMDL Site
channel.description: Recent content in Test on My HugoMDL Site

item.title: Keenan's musings
item.description: Website layout I’ve thought to include four sections: Home - dashboard of the website which i will try get to show a little bit of content from the three other sections. Articles - could have another name. This is where our personal responses and possibly our collective response will be posted. Projects - quite a varied space - could be a place to describe our work or projects at varsity our extra curricular / community engagement / personal interests.

item.title: Linet's ideas
item.description: Things I would need from you Your personal blog post in a word document or something similar. If this could be formatted as you would like it to appear then I will try to match as closely as possible in the actual post. There are a couple of extra fields that I would need some meta-data for in order to make the post as complete as possible:

item.title: Thabo's contemplations
item.description: Wesite design This really is entirely up to us. I have used the Joburg night skyline. For simplicity and uniformity I have kept this across the main pages. Each blog post and project can then have it’s own header and description. I have kept the default projects but you are free customise these fairly extensively.

item.title: Stuart's post
item.description: Design ideas Thoughts on the post header backgrounds (the geometric kind of pattern at the top of each post): choose a picture that describes you choose a picture that highlights one of the ideas you feel is important from your reflections any other thoughts? Personal reflection ideas from my side I think we should spend some time on our own going through the reflection questions and compose our personal responses.
